text: Self-Portrait as a Female Martyr Self-Portrait as a Female Martyr is a painting by the Italian artist Artemisia Gentileschi. It was painted around 1615. It is currently in a private collection. An inscription on the reverse confirms that it is painted by Gentileschi. It is one of two paintings by Gentileschi painted with oil on wood == References == Category:Paintings by Artemisia Gentileschi Category:1610s paintings Category:Self-portraits
title: Self-Portrait as a Female Martyr
